arabicText: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةًۭ مِّن طِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText: “To	throw	upon	them	stones	of	baked	clay.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ke	un	par	gāre	ke	banaye	huwe	pat-thar	
chordeiñ.

arabicText: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“That	are	kept	marked,	with	your	Lord,	
for	the	transgressors.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	tumhāre	Rab	ke	pās	had	se	badhne	
waloñ		ke	liye	nishān	kiye	rakhe	haiñ

arabicText: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	We	removed	the	people	who	had	faith,	
from	that	town.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	ham	ne	us	shaher	meiñ	jo	Imān	wāle	
they	nikāl	liye

arabicText: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
We	therefore	found	just	one	house	over	
there	that	was	Muslim.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	ham	ne	wahāñ	ek	hi	ghar	Musalman	
pāya

arabicText: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	kept	a	sign	remaining	in	it,	for	
those	who	fear	the	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	us	meiñ	nishāni	bāqi	rakhi	
unke	liye	jo	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		se	darte	haiñ

arabicText: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍۢ مُّبِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	Moosa,	when	We	sent	him	with	a	
clear	proof	towards	Firaun.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Mūsā	meiñ	jab	hum	ne	usey	raushan	
sanad	lekar	fir'aun	ke	pās	bheja

arabicText: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
In	response,	he	turned	away	along	with	
his	army	and	said,	“He	is	a	magician	or	a	
madman.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	apne	lashkar	samet	phir	gaya	aur	bola	
jādugar	hai	ya	deewāna

arabicText: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
We	therefore	seized	him	and	his	army	and	
threw	them	into	the	sea,	while	he	was	
blaming	himself.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	hum	ne	usey	aur	uske	lashkar	ko	
pakad	kar	dariya	meiñ	dāl	diya	is	hāl	meiñ	
ke	woh	apne	āap		ko	malāmat	kar	raha	tha

arabicText: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	the	tribe	of	A’ad,	when	we	sent	a	
dry	windstorm	upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Āad	meiñ	jab	hum	ne	un	par	khushk	
āañdhi	bheji

arabicText: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
It	left	out	nothing	in	its	path,	but	which	it	
split	up	into	fragments.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jis	cheez	par	guzarti	usey	gali	huyi	cheez	
ki	tarah	kar	chhodti

arabicText: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	in	the	tribe	of	Thamud	when	it	was	
told	to	them,	“Enjoy	for	a	while.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Samood	meiñ	jab	un	se	farmāya	gaya	
ek	waqt	tak	barat	lo

arabicText: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
In	response	they	rebelled	against	their	
Lord’s	command,	so	the	thunderbolt	
seized	them	whilst	they	were	watching.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	unhoñ	ne	apne	Rab	ke	ḥukm		se	sar
kashi	ki	to	unki	āñkhoñ	ke	sāmne	unheiñ	
kadak	ne	āa	liya

arabicText: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍۢ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText: So	they	were	neither	able	to	stand	up,	nor	were	they	able	to	take	revenge.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	woh	na	khade	ho	sake	aur	na	woh	badla	le	sakte	they.

arabicText: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍۢ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًۭا فَـٰسِقِينَ
englishTranslationText: And	before	them,	We	destroyed	the	people	of	Nooh;	they	were	indeed	a	sinning	nation.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	un	se	pehle	Qaum-e-Nūh	ko	halāk	farmāya	be-shak		woh	fāsiq	log	they.

arabicText: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍۢ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	We	have	built	the	heaven	with	hands	(the	Divine	Power),	and	it	is	We	Who	give	the	expanse.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	āasmān	ko	hum	ne	hāthoñ	se	banāya	aur	be-shak		hum	wus'at	dene	wāle	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	We	made	the	earth	a	base,	so	how	well	do	We	lay	out!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	zameen	ko	hum	ne	farsh	kiya	to	hum	kya	hi	achchhe	bichhāne	wāle

arabicText: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	We	created	all	things	in	pairs,	so	that	you	may	ponder.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	hum	ne	har	cheez	ke	do	jod	banāye	ke	tum	dhiyān	karo

arabicText: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText: “Therefore	rush	towards	Allah;	indeed	I	am	from	Him,	a	clear	Herald	of	Warning	towards	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText: To	Allah	ki	taraf	bhāgo	be-shak		maiñ	uski	taraf	se	tumhāre	liye	sareeh	dar	sunāne	wāla	hooñ	.

arabicText: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
“And	do	not	appoint	other	deities	along	with	Allah;	indeed	I	am	from	Him,	a	clear	Herald	of	
Warning	towards	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ke	sāth	aur	ma'bood	na	thehrāo	be-shak		maiñ	uski	taraf	se	tumhāre	liye	sareeh	dar	
sunāne	wala	hooñ.

arabicText: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ
englishTranslationText:
Similarly,	whenever	a	Noble	Messenger	
came	to	those	before	them	they	always	
said,	“He	is	a	magician	or	a	madman.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yuñ	hi	jab	in	se	agloñ	ke	pās	koi	Rasool	
tashreef	lāya	to	yehi	bole	ke	jādugar	hai	
ya	deewana

arabicText: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌۭ طَاغُونَ
englishTranslationText:
What!	Have	they	willed	this	utterance	to	
one	another?	In	fact	they	are	a	rebellious	
people.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	āpas		meiñ	ek	doosre	ko	yeh	bāt	keh	
mare	haiñ	balke	woh	sarkash	log	haiñ

arabicText: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	turn	away	from	them	(O	dear	
Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him),	-	so	there	is	no	blame	upon	
you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	aey	Mehboob!	Tum	un	se	moñh	pher	lo	
to	tum	par	kuch	ilzām	nahi

arabicText: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	advise,	for	advice	benefits	the	
Muslims.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	samjhāo	ke	samjhāna	Musalmanoñ		
ko	fāida	deta	hai.

arabicText: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
englishTranslationText:
And	I	created	the	jinns	and	men,	only	for	
them	to	worship	Me.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	maiñ	ne	Jin	aur	Ādmi	apne	hi	(isi)	liye	
banaye	ke	meri	bandagi	kareñ

arabicText: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍۢ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ
englishTranslationText:
I	do	not	ask	any	sustenance	from	them,	
nor	wish	that	they	give	Me	food.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Maiñ	un	se	kuch	rizq	nahi	māñgta	aur	na	
yeh	chāhta	huñ	ke	woh	mujhe	khāna	deiñ

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	it	is	Allah,	Who	is	the	Greatest	
Sustainer,	the	Strong,	the	Able.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	Allah	hi	bada	rizq	dene	wāla	
quwwat	wāla	qudrat	wāla	hai

arabicText: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًۭا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
englishTranslationText:
And	indeed	for	these	unjust	is	also	a	turn	
of	punishment,	like	that	of	their	
companions	-	so	they	must	not	ask	Me	to	
hasten.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	be-shak	un	zālimoñ	ke	liye	‘aƶāb	ki	ek	
bāri	hai	jaise	unke	sāth	waloñ		ke	liye	ek	
bāri	thi	to	mujh	se	jaldi	na	kareñ

arabicText: فَوَيْلٌۭ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	ruin	is	for	disbelievers,	from	their	day	-	
which	they	are	promised.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kāfiroñ	ki	kharābi	hai	unke	us	din	se	
jiska	w’ada	diye	jāte	haiñ.

arabicText: وَٱلطُّورِ
englishTranslationText: By	oath	of	(mount)	Tuur.
romanUrduTranslationText: Toor	ki	qasam

arabicText: وَكِتَـٰبٍۢ مَّسْطُورٍۢ
englishTranslationText: And	by	oath	of	a	passage,	written	-
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	us	nawishte	ki

arabicText: فِى رَقٍّۢ مَّنشُورٍۢ
englishTranslationText: On	an	open	record.
romanUrduTranslationText: Jo	khule	daftar	meiñ	likha	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْمَعْمُورِ
englishTranslationText: And	by	oath	of	the	Inhabited	House.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Bai't-e-Mā'moor

arabicText: وَٱلسَّقْفِ ٱلْمَرْفُوعِ
englishTranslationText: And	the	lofty	roof.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	buland	chhat

arabicText: وَٱلْبَحْرِ ٱلْمَسْجُورِ
englishTranslationText: And	the	sea	set	aflame.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	sulgaye	huwe	samandar	ki
